name: File system
description: Read and write local files and folders.

conditions.name: Is supported
conditions.description: Test whether file system operations are supported on the current browser/platform.

conditions.name: On picker complete
conditions.description: Triggered after showing a file/folder picker when the user successfully made a selection.

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: Tag of the corresponding picker.

conditions.name: On picker error
conditions.description: Triggered after showing a file/folder picker when the user did not make a selection (including cancelling).

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: Tag of the corresponding picker.

conditions.name: Has picker tag
conditions.description: Check if a picker tag is available. This includes pickers remembered from prior sessions.

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: Tag of the corresponding picker.

conditions.name: On file operation complete
conditions.description: Triggered upon successfully completing a file operation.

params.name: File tag
params.description: Tag of the corresponding file operation.

conditions.name: On file operation error
conditions.description: Triggered when a file operation fails.

params.name: File tag
params.description: Tag of the corresponding file operation.

conditions.name: On any file operation complete
conditions.description: Triggered upon successfully completing any file operation. The 'FileTag' expression identifies the operation.

conditions.name: On any file operation error
conditions.description: Triggered when any file operation fails. The 'FileTag' expression identifies the operation.

conditions.name: Desktop features supported
conditions.description: True when running on a platform which supports known folder picker tags and desktop-only actions.

conditions.name: Has file/folder
conditions.description: After the 'List content' action completes, check if a name exists in the file or folder lists.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to check for a file or folder.

params.name: Name
params.description: The file or folder name to check for.

params.name: Case-sensitive
params.description: Whether to check the name case-sensitively. Note some file systems are case-sensitive.

conditions.name: On dropped files
conditions.description: Triggered when files are dragged and dropped in to the window.

actions.name: Add accept type
actions.description: Add a category of files allowed to be accepted by the next file picker.
actions.display_text: Add accept type [i]{0}[/i] with file extensions [i]{1}[/i] description [i]{2}[/i]

params.name: MIME type
params.description: A MIME type for this category of files, such as "image/png", "image/*", or "application/octet-stream".

params.name: File extensions
params.description: A list of file extensions allowed in this category separated by semicolons, e.g. ".png;.jpg".

params.name: Description
params.description: A description to show to the user for this category, e.g. "Image files".

actions.name: Show save file picker
actions.description: Show a save file picker, allowing the user to choose a file to write to.
actions.display_text: Show save file picker tag [b]{0}[/b] (show accept all [i]{1}[/i], suggested name [i]{2}[/i], ID [i]{3}[/i], start in [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: A string to identify this particular file picker.

params.name: Show accept all
params.description: Whether to show an accept type that shows all files.

params.name: Suggested name
params.description: A default filename to suggest saving as.

params.name: Picker ID (optional)
params.description: An optional string to identify this picker for remembering its settings.

params.name: Start in
params.description: The default folder to show when there are no prior remembered settings.

actions.name: Show open file picker
actions.description: Show a save file picker, allowing the user to choose a file to write to.
actions.display_text: Show open file picker tag [b]{0}[/b] (show accept all [i]{1}[/i], multiple [i]{2}[/i], ID [i]{3}[/i], start in [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: A string to identify this particular file picker.

params.name: Show accept all
params.description: Whether to show an accept type that shows all files.

params.name: Multiple
params.description: Whether to allow selecting multiple files to open.

params.name: Picker ID (optional)
params.description: An optional string to identify this picker for remembering its settings.

params.name: Start in
params.description: The default folder to show when there are no prior remembered settings.

actions.name: Show folder picker
actions.description: Show a save file picker, allowing the user to choose a file to write to.
actions.display_text: Show folder picker tag [b]{0}[/b] mode [i]{1}[/i] (ID [i]{2}[/i], start in [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: A string to identify this particular folder picker.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The kind of access permission to request for the folder.

params.name: Picker ID (optional)
params.description: An optional string to identify this picker for remembering its settings.

params.name: Start in
params.description: The default folder to show when there are no prior remembered settings.

actions.name: Write text file
actions.description: Write a text file to a previously picked file or folder.
actions.display_text: Write text file for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] with content [i]{3}[/i] (folder path [i]{1}[/i], file tag [i]{2}[/i], [i]{4}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the file picker identifying where to write a file.

params.name: Folder path (optional)
params.description: When the picker was a folder or open multiple picker, the name or path to write to, e.g. "folder/file.txt".

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

params.name: Text
params.description: String of the text to write to the file.

params.name: Mode
params.description: Whether to overwrite the file contents or append to the existing file.

actions.name: Write binary file
actions.description: Write binary data to a previously picked file or folder.
actions.display_text: Write binary file for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] with content {3} (folder path [i]{1}[/i], file tag [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the file picker identifying where to write a file.

params.name: Folder path (optional)
params.description: When the picker was a folder or open multiple picker, the name or path to write to, e.g. "folder/file.txt".

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

params.name: Data
params.description: The Binary Data object to write to the file.

actions.name: Read text file
actions.description: Read a text file from a previously picked file or folder.
actions.display_text: Read text file for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] (folder path [i]{1}[/i], file tag [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the file picker identifying where to read a file.

params.name: Folder path (optional)
params.description: When the picker was a folder or open multiple picker, the name or path to read from, e.g. "folder/file.txt".

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

actions.name: Read binary file
actions.description: Read binary data from a previously picked file or folder.
actions.display_text: Read binary file for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] to {3} (folder path [i]{1}[/i], file tag [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the file picker identifying where to read a file.

params.name: Folder path (optional)
params.description: When the picker was a folder or open multiple picker, the name or path to read from, e.g. "folder/file.txt".

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

params.name: Data
params.description: The Binary Data object to read the content of the file in to.

actions.name: Create folder
actions.description: Create a new folder within a picked folder.
actions.display_text: Create folder for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] at [i]{1}[/i] (file tag [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the folder picker to work in.

params.name: Folder path
params.description: The path of the folder to create. This can include multiple subfolders, e.g. "folder\subfolder".

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

actions.name: Copy file
actions.description: Copy a file within a picked folder.
actions.display_text: Copy file for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] from [i]{1}[/i] to [i]{2}[/i] (file tag [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the folder picker to work in.

params.name: Source path
params.description: The path of the source file to copy.

params.name: Destination path
params.description: The path of the destination file where a copy is created.

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

actions.name: Delete
actions.description: Delete a file or folder within a picked folder.
actions.display_text: Delete from picker tag [b]{0}[/b] path [i]{1}[/i] (recursive [i]{2}[/i], file tag [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the folder picker to work in.

params.name: Folder path
params.description: The path of the file or folder to delete.

params.name: Recursive
params.description: When specifying a folder, whether to recursively delete the folder's content as well.

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

actions.name: List content
actions.description: Retrieve a list of the files and folders at a given path in a folder.
actions.display_text: List content for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] path [i]{1}[/i] (recursive: [i]{2}[/i], file tag [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the folder picker to work in.

params.name: Folder path
params.description: The path of the folder to list the contents for. This can be an empty string to list the contents of the picked folder.

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

params.name: Recursive
params.description: Whether to list the content of all subfolders as well.

actions.name: Shell open
actions.description: Open the default associated app for a file.
actions.display_text: Shell open picker tag [b]{0}[/b] path [i]{1}[/i] (file tag [i]{2}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the folder picker to work in.

params.name: File path
params.description: The path of the file to open.

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

actions.name: Run file
actions.description: Run a file, such as executing another program.
actions.display_text: Run file picker tag [b]{0}[/b] path [i]{1}[/i] arguments [i]{2}[/i] (file tag [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the folder picker to work in. For this action specifically, this can be left empty to specify a path that can be found on the system (e.g. "cmd.exe").

params.name: File path
params.description: The path of the file to execute.

params.name: Arguments
params.description: A string of any command-line arguments to pass to the executed program.

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

actions.name: Move file
actions.description: Move (or rename) a file within a picked folder.
actions.display_text: Move file for picker tag [b]{0}[/b] from [i]{1}[/i] to [i]{2}[/i] (file tag [i]{3}[/i])

params.name: Picker tag
params.description: The tag of the folder picker to work in.

params.name: Source path
params.description: The path of the source file to move.

params.name: Destination path
params.description: The path of the destination to move the file to.

params.name: File tag (optional)
params.description: An optional tag to identify this specific file operation.

expressions.name: FileNameAt
expressions.description: The name of a file at a given index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of file.

expressions.name: FolderNameAt
expressions.description: The name of a folder at a given index.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of folder.

expressions.name: FileText
expressions.description: The text content of a file after a successful read.

expressions.name: FileTag
expressions.description: Get the tag for a file system operation in a trigger.

expressions.name: PickerTag
expressions.description: The associated picker tag in a trigger.

expressions.name: FolderPath
expressions.description: The associated path to the file/folder in a trigger for a folder operation.
